Circle CCTP x Noble message decoding & IAVL issues
Repo/PR:
https://www.mintscan.io/noble/tx/5931A0DF16C0D29006CBAB3FD1762F31BF2AE61CE21E36899AC245FA046C867F?height=4593256

circle Cctp v 1 Deposit For Burn → echo AAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAj7YDV80kNsJIP/pmD4ZR8jAsxV8= | base64 --decode | od -A n -t x1 gives us the ETH addresses of 0x8fb6…5f as we desire
